summary: This mod, is inspired by Demons and Angels by Enoomnai and is my attempt at recreating it.
descriptionHtml:
[u][size=4][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][right]Demons and Angels - Remade[/right][/font][/size][/u]
[size=2][i]
[/i][/size][right][size=2][i]Added In 0.8:
Two new races; Demon, Angel.
Two new spells; Demon Flames, Angel Healing.
Two new spell tomes; Demon Flames, Angel Healing.
Changes the race of both the Restoration Master Trainer, and the Destruction Master Trainer.

Added In 0.9;
Two new factions, one Demon, one Angel.
A new Book.
Archdemon and Archangel races. {Not playable without the below Spells}
Two Transformation Spells, one Demon, one Angel. Demon transforms into Archdemon, Angel transforms into Archangel. {Can be bought off Urag in the College}
Sixteen new NPCs, eight templates, seven named Archdemons, one named Archangel. {However must be spawned in, as Dungeons not yet added.}

Going To Be Added Next Update;
14 Dungeons.
Demons, within the dungeons of their masters.
Seven Archdemons, each within their own designated dungeon.
Seven Archangels, each within their own designated dungeon.
Angels, within the deungeons of their masters.
New Books, within the dungeons.

[color=#000000]To Add List;
Two new followers, one Demon, one Angel.
Two new trainers, one Demon, one Angel.
Two new merchants, one Demon, one Angel.
Several new books, with new lore and stories.
Fifteen bosses, seven Demon, seven Angel, one ultimate boss.
Fifteen new dungeons, seven Demon, seven Angel, one ultimate dungeon.
Multiple new armor and weapons.
Two questlines, twenty quests, ten Demon, ten Angel.
[/color][/i][/size]

Thanks For Endorsing;
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/273065/?]SwiftyB[/url],
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/10636657/?]Johnnybear372[/url],
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/5059075/?]Abacron[/url],
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/16599564/?]Lordulli[/url],
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/6476433/?]popymanq[/url],
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/5339561/?]tadol[/url],
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/9183729/?]skagdx[/url],
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/21314859/?]needmoreore[/url],
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/1659171/?]grimsaka[/url].

[b][size=2][i]This mod, is inspired by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/39073/?]Demons and Angels by Enoomnai[/url] and is my attempt at recreating it.[/i][/size][/b][/right]
author: TheOnlyGuildMaster
